verse.name: v1
verse.lines: God be with you till we meet again; By His counsels guide, uphold you, With His sheep securely fold you: God be with you till we meet again.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Till we meet, till we meet, Till we meet at Jesus' feet; Till we meet, till we meet, God be with you till we meet again.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: God be with you till we meet again, When life's perils thick confound you, Put His arms unfailing round you; God be with you till we meet again.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: God be with you till we meet again, Keep love's banner floating o'er you, Smite death's threat'ning wave before you; God be with you till we meet again.
